articles.description: The former Love Island star took to social media on Sunday to share that he has bought four holiday cottages in Pembrokeshire and 'would love one to be home to a Ukrainian family'
articles.content:
Love Island's Dr Alex George has been praised by fans after revealing he's bought four holiday cottages in Pembrokeshire and plans to house a Ukrainian family in one.

articles.title: Trevor Noah mocks Will Smith at the Grammys - Evening Standard
articles.description: Trevor Noah appeared to mock Will Smith as he opened the Grammys on Sunday night.
articles.content:
The comedian made a sly dig at the Hollywood superstar while hosting the music awards show at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas.
